name: dashboard_production
example_task: Deliver the FINAL dashboard. REQS: 1. Use 'dashboard_base.html' as your template for index.html. 2. main.js MUST use Chart.js to render real-time CPU/RAM/VRAM from http://127.0.0.1:8080/system/metrics. 3. main.js MUST connect to ws://127.0.0.1:8080/ws/events and append log records to the 'logs' panel. 4. Populate the 'member-list' by fetching /runs.
